name: Avoid the cube (E-PXL)
description:
Hello, my real name isn't E-PXL, i made this game in like 3 or 4 hours, and the reason is that i need money for my school, if you want to suport me, pls consider buying the first version,if you dont want, you can wait till I release the free game, the free version itst NOT going to get updates, instead of the full version. if you are reading this, press P on your keyboard 3 times.

Hola, mi nombre real no es E-PXL, hice este juego en 3 o 4 horas, y la razón es que necesito dinero para mi escuela, si quieres apoyarme, por favor considera comprar la primera versión, si si no quieres, puedes esperar hasta que lance el juego gratuito, la versión gratuita NO recibirá actualizaciones, sino la versión completa. Si estás leyendo esto, presiona P en tu teclado 3 veces.

THX

If the game get 5 downloads (or get $5) i will inmediatly update it, and you don't need to download it again, or buy it again, if the game gets $100 il make a BIG update, and if the game reach $300 i will make the game free, update every week, more gamemodes, skins, history, a better game and maybe, a new game free for all the people that buy the game
